amendment.description: To authorize appropriations for the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency to conduct research and development in key technology focus areas.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2023, under the order of 5/25/21, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 67 - 30. Record Vote Number: 213.

action.text: Amendment SA 2023 proposed by Senator Sasse to Amendment SA 1502. (consideration: CR S3495-3496; text: CR S3495) To authorize appropriations for the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency to conduct research and development in key technology focus areas.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2023, under the order of 5/25/21, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 67 - 30. Record Vote Number: 213.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2023, under the order of 5/25/21, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 67 - 30. Record Vote Number: 213.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2023 proposed by Senator Sasse to Amendment SA 1502.
